
caption <- "Adulticides and/or larvicides (brand and product name) used (ref Q35c)"
responses <- get_responses("35c")
cbind(Country=data$SI01, responses) %>%
  drop_na( Response ) %>%
  rename("Product used"=Response) %>%
  regulartable() %>%
  hline( part="body") %>%
  set_caption(caption) %>% autofit()
